artist: Designer: In the style of Koloman Moser; Manufacturer: August Ungethüm Kunstmöbelfabrik
medium: Palisander, satinwood, mirror glass, marble, nickel plated mounts
text:
The sideboard, originally part of a larger dining room suite, is impressive for its scale, dark
wood veneers inlaid with grapes on the vine in a lighter wood and nickel silver lock plates and keys. It was made in the first decade of the 20th century by one of the leading cabinetmaking
firms in Vienna with close ties to the artistic avant-garde of the time.
title: Dining room sideboard
